direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve handling and manipulating enforced attributes for tags.
Both methods deal with the management of enforced attributes but in opposite operations (adding vs. removing).
Both methods are involved in validating and managing attributes for elements, though they serve different purposes.
Both methods handle attribute validation and may throw exceptions or handle invalid inputs similarly.

enhanced_by.reason: Setting up enforced attributes via this method is necessary to test the retrieval of those attributes in getEnforcedAttributes.
Ensuring attributes are safe before retrieving enforced attributes can be part of the test setup.
Removing enforced attributes can be part of the test cleanup to ensure no side effects in subsequent tests.
